programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Pride Lands - Spend one day and one night in Zambias Luangwa Valley with Africas most fearsome hunters-a pride of lions. The lions are hungry because they havent managed to make a large kill in days and tempers are starting to flare.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Leopard's Last Stand - A wise, old leopard reigns over the Luangwa Valley in Zambia. She holds her own against lions, but is about to face her most serious challenge - the arrival of a younger, nomadic female leopard. Witness the bitter battle of experience versus vitality.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Endangered Species - With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow, which means they keep taking a beating from both predators and cars. Can they be saved?

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Damning Truth - A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Baboons of Bambelela - With power in numbers, adaptability and intelligent leadership, the Bambelela baboon troop is an excellent example of why baboons thrive throughout Africa. Their highly refined social behavior and organization mirror much of human society and show just how alike we are to our primate cousins.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Peccary Party - In the heart of the Pantanal wetlands, theres a region so remote very few humans ever get there.The lack of human interaction makes this the perfect habitat for a thunderous herd of three hundred white-lipped peccaries. These large pig-like mammals grow up to forty five kilos and have stripes of white hair underneath their chin which gives them their distinctive appearance and name.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Partners - Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teachers pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Great Escape - Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn - An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Rana: Queen of the Jungle - One of the most iconic animals on Earth stalks the jungles of India: the Bengal Tiger. Over the course of a single day, we follow the fortunes of one mother and her three young cubs. She must provide enough food for her family to stay alive.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Youngsters of the Desert - A young lion cub must survive as his family is torn apart; two adolescent leopard cubs must fend for themselves after they are abandoned, and a young adult blackbuck must risk life and limb as he tries to secure his first mating.

programme.title: Africa's Claws & Jaws 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Predator's Plight - There are animals on earth that are born to kill. Specialized hunters with impressive weapons and unique attack strategies. Every predator has a plight. They must kill to survive. The harsh reality of life as a hunter is never knowing where your next meal is coming from.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep4
programme.desc: India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day - Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bound By Blood - Dry season in Zambia means new life for the Nsefu pride of lions along the Luangwa River. From their first day on earth to the playful days of youth, see how new cubs rely on the strong bond of the entire pride for their survival.

programme.desc: Sam Smith is in the spotlight now as we play his best videos!

programme.title: Global Beats!
programme.desc: Tune in for a selection of the biggest Hip-Hop, R&B, K-Pop and Reggaeton beats that are taking over the world!

programme.title: Rock.Alt.Indie
programme.desc: Plug in your guitar and amp up the volume because we're bringing you the best of the best from the Rock, Alternative and Indie scene!

programme.title: MTV Unplugged: Liam Gallagher
programme.desc: Recorded live at the Hull City Hall, legendary frontman Liam Gallagher performs a one-off acoustic set of songs from his solo albums along with some Oasis classics, exclusively for MTV Unplugged.

programme.title: Placebo Unplugged: MTV World Stage
programme.desc: Recorded at The London Studios where they played their first ever concert, watch Placebo's beautiful MTV Unplugged highlights.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2016
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2016 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep29
programme.desc: Rupert and the Dancing Shoes - Raggety wants new shoes but can't afford them so Ping Pong tries to jazz up the ones he's wearing but her spell goes wrong and the shoes dance off with Raggety inside them and unable to stop. Will Rupert and Ping Pong be able to stop Raggety in time before the shoes carry him one step too far, into danger?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep30
programme.desc: Rupert and the Oldest Tree - Rupert is on a hunt for leaves to fill his new wall chart. He meets Raggety who offers to help him find a strange star-shaped leaf from a magical tree the oldest tree in Nutwood. The Fox Twins don't think much of leaf hunting. They overhear Rupert's plans and decide to play a trick on Rupert and Raggety. But their trick backfires when Raggety does some elf magic and Freddie vanishes into thin air. How will Rupert and Raggety find Freddie and get him back to Freda? And what of their search for the oldest tree in the forest?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep31
programme.desc: Rupert and the Clockwork Dragon - Ming is hurt when Rupert and friends appear to prefer Bill's new toy dragon to her. But when the toy gets them lost in the woods they discover there are some things that only a real dragon can do.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep32
programme.desc: Rupert and the Moon Adventure - With the sun low in the sky, Rupert waves to Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Ming as they join him at his cottage. They are all going to stay up late to see something very special an eclipse of the moon. Bill is just explaining what an eclipse is when Raggety arrives. In his impatience, he does not want to wait for the moon to rise. He wants to see it straight away. Raggety does elf magic to see the moon at once but promptly vanishes. The others think he is playing a trick and hiding from them, but when Bill looks through the telescope, keen to see the start of the eclipse he gets a shock. Raggety has got his wish to see the moon. His magic has taken him there! How will Rupert and friends get him back down before the eclipse shrinks the moon down to nothing? It is a race against time to save their little elf friend.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep29
programme.desc: How Can We Make The Most Beautiful Garden Ever? - Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep30
programme.desc: Why Are There Little Hills In The Orchard? - Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep31
programme.desc: Why Are There So Many Ladybirds? - One winter morning Jess finds lots of ladybird in his barn. Why are they there? That's the Big Question! Mimi tells him that she has lots of ladybirds in her garden in the summer. They're always hungry and brilliant for the plants because they eat all the greenfly. Maybe they're looking for greenfly in his barn? Jess doesn't think so. There are no greenfly in the barn. He goes to ask Baa and Billie for help. They're saying goodbye to Little Bird who's flying away to a warmer country for the winter. Jess thinks maybe the ladybirds are gathering to fly away too and rushes back to his barn to say goodbye. But when he gets there he finds that the ladybirds are now all huddled together and fast asleep. What's going on? Jess goes to ask Willow and finds a hedgehog sleeping under some leaves near the stable. Willow explains that some animals find it hard to find food in the winter, especially if they can't store it, so they eat as much as they can and then go to sleep during the winter. It's called hibe

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep32
programme.desc: How Can I Stop Little Bird Eating The Seeds? - Mimi's really upset with Little Bird who keeps eating all her lettuce seeds. Jess wonders how they can stop her. They try putting out extra food for her but Little Bird just eats everything! Jess wonders if covering the seeds with something so that Little Bird can't reach them would work. Mimi says it's a good idea but the sun won't reach the seeds either which means they won't grow. The only thing that seems to stop t Little Bird is when she sees Jess and is frightened away. But Jess can't stand still in the vegetable patch forever! Willow sees him and tells him he's being a scarecrow. A scarecrow? Yes, something that scares away the birds. Mimi has a brilliant idea to make the perfect scarecrow. A Jess scarecrow. Little Bird stops eating the lettuce seeds and eats from the lovely bird table they put out for her instead. Hooray!

programme.title: Olivia Ep43
programme.desc: Olivia Keeps A Secret - Mother is busy planning a birthday party for Francine, and Olivia wants to help. The big surprise TV star Kicky the Kangaroo -is due to make a special appearance. But when unexpected problems confront Kicky, Olivia has to step in and save Francine's party!

programme.title: Olivia Ep44
programme.desc: Olivia Gets Fit - In preparation for their class track and field day dubbed the Hogenmuller Games after their teacher -Olivia uses a unique training regiment to help her best friend Julian be the fastest runner he can be and to give herself a jump on the competition in her own event.

programme.title: Olivia Ep45
programme.desc: Olivia Goes To The Library - On a trip to the library with Father and Ian, Olivia hopes to renew her fantastic book so she can finish it. During story time the book goes missing and Olivia and Ian set off to find it. She just can't go home without knowing how the book ends!

programme.title: Olivia Ep46
programme.desc: Olivia Makes A Wedding Gift - Olivia's favourite art teacher, Miss Davis, is getting married, and Olivia wants to find her the perfect wedding present. But despite all of her fundraising efforts, she only has enough for a very small gift. With help from her classmates, Olivia creates a very special card for Miss Davis to go along with the gift.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep29
programme.desc: Why Wildebeest Stampede - You see there was a time when Wildebeest didn't stampede. They used to stand on the plains and munch grass all day. But there were so many of them and they were eating so much grass that all the animals had to do something about it. Tortoise realized that the Wildebeest weren't the brightest animals in Tinga Tinga and they always did whatever the last beast said. So the animals decided to tell the Wildebeest that they were welcome to stay in Tinga Tinga and they must never RUN!' So what did the Wildebeest do? They ran and they ran and they RAN! So that's Why Wildebeest Stampede! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep30
programme.desc: Why Chameleon Changes Colour - You see there was a time when Chameleon wasn't bright and colourful at all. In fact Chameleon was rather dull and grey like a rainy day. One day when all the animals are playing games and sheltering from the rains Chameleon decides to slip away because he feels boring. Butterfly comes across Chameleon sitting sadly on a rock and shows him a rainbow. Chameleon can't resist and stands on the Rainbow, and TA-DAH!! He turns red and yellow and pink and green! Chameleon soaks up all the colours of the magical rainbow and now, KAPOW!! Chameleon can be any colour he wants! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep31
programme.desc: Why Leopard Has Spots - You see there was a time when Leopard didn't have spots. All the animals had something special; Lion had his mane, Peacock his beautiful tail, Zebra his stripes but Leopard was as plain as plain can be. Then one day Leopard made friends with Puff Adder with his bright colourful spots. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep32
programme.desc: Why Hyena Has Short Back Legs - You see there was a time when Hyena didn't have short back legs. He was always chasing around and nipping other animals on the bottom. Then one day the animals had enough. It was time to teach that naughty Hyena a lesson! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep7
programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep46
programme.desc: Queen of the Castle/Truth or Dare - Poppy attempts to complete her Dads abandoned plans for the greatest sand castle of all time. Unfortunately, she didnt take the tides into consideration. Now shes in a battle with the ocean to preserve the precious castle!/When playing truth or dare, Biggie always chooses truth. But when he notices that this makes the game less fun for his friends, he strives to become the sort of Troll who could pull off a dare.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep59
programme.desc: The Iceman Melteth - A terrifying ice monster comes from the portal with a grudge against Puss in Boots, but when the sun proves too much for the water based beast, the San Lorenzans help in an unexpected way

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep7
programme.desc: Eep-Over / Thunkytown - When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep34
programme.desc: A Welsh Trick & Treat - Its Halloween time and the Wanderers get a WanderPost from Odlulu issuing a challenge: Come to my Haunted House in Wales if you dare! Wally and Wenda, arent scared by Odlulu and Fritzs attempt at creating a haunted house with goofy Halloween decorations. So Odlulu uses the magical Haunted House Key to bring a few of the decorations to life.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep26
programme.desc: Snow Dog, Snow! - When Tag and Scooch learn that Sandra Paws' sleigh broke down on a mountain, they have to go on an adventure to fix the sleigh and save Sniffs-mas! Meanwhile, Beans tries to get a grumpy Frank to feel the Sniffs-mas spirit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep7
programme.desc: Pet Project / Mission Improbable - When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sams behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into mans best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, its up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Marias painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep13
programme.desc: Postman Pat's Camping Chaos - Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep14
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The King's Armour - It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep17
programme.desc: Bad Moon Rising - After a strange creature bites Tuffnut, he believes he'll turn into a legendary Lycanwing dragon when the moon is full unless his friends can save him

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep18
programme.desc: Snoutlout Gets The Axe - When Snotlout and Astrid must fly a ceremonial battle axe to a family wedding, they must work together when an Armorwing dragon derails their plan

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep6
programme.desc: Poison in the Pit of the Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep7
programme.desc: Big Trouble in Panda Village - The kids must leave Po to escape into the forest and head back to Panda Village to prepare against Jindiao

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep9
programme.desc: Big Poppy / Neighbor War - When a troll starts to ruin the fun of open mic night Poppy is forced to enter a compliment battle.Branch tries to drive Sky Toronto away when he moves next door.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep9
programme.desc: Silly Collection/Hat Wars - Leaf has a collection of sand, but when Rocksy discovers the sand is sentient, she tries to rescue them. / Very Berry creates a new hat that everyone hates, except when Twig wears it. Berry becomes jealous of Twigs newly found attention and tries to steal her hat back.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep22
programme.desc: Scimitar - While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep33
programme.desc: Rupert and the Grumbleclouds - Rupert goes to meet Bill who seems very grumpy. Bill has grumble clouds over his head. Edward is the next one to have a dark, purple cloud over his head and he becomes very sad. Ping Pong tries a spell and the clouds break up and go away but then they return above everyone's head. Everyone gets the grumps except Rupert and Ming. Rupert and Ming try to make the others laugh and succeed with their disastrous magic show. Everyone starts laughing and they all cheer up!

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep34
programme.desc: Rupert and the Playful Wind - Rupert, Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill meet a young wind, Gustus. All of the grown up winds are too busy making weather and Gustus has no one to play with so he gets very bored and mischievous and causes chaos with his wind. Rupert shows Gustus some games he can play using his wind in a more productive way.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep35
programme.desc: Ruperts Birds Eye View - Rupert and Bill wish they could see more from the Tree House Telescope so Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to give them a better view. Unfortunately the magic is more powerful than they expect and the Telescope Platform, with Rupert and Bill on board, detaches itself and flies off to find a better view. At first, Rupert and Bill are excited to be flying about, but then the Telescope begins to cause trouble, first landing on Ping Pong's Pagoda, then heading to Rocky Bay where it lands on the Lighthouse to enjoy the sea view. By now, Rupert and Bill, who cannot get down, want to go home and the Lighthouse Keeper is beside himself. The Telescope Platform is blocking the Lighthouse light and with night approaching it will be a disaster if they cannot get the Platform to go back to the Tree House.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep36
programme.desc: Rupert and the Memory Man - The friends don't know what to do when a spell goes wrong and Edward loses his memory. Although Raggety summons up the Memory Man to show Edward some exciting memories from his past he still can't remember anything until Rupert gives him one of his very favourite things: an apple..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep33
programme.desc: How Can I Go Up And Down On The See-Saw? - Baa and Billie have built a fantastic new see-saw in the meadow. Jess can't wait to have a go. But when he tries to make it go up and down with him on one end and Baa and Billie on the other he just gets stuck in the air and can't get the see saw down. How can I go up and down on the see saw?' he asks? -desperate to have all the up and down' fun he see the puppies having when they jump on the see-saw. Jess asks Horace the hoppy frog what he knows about up and down', he talks to Willow about scales and weighing things until finally he works it out if he finds someone roughly the same weight as him balanced just like the puppies were - he'll do it! He works out that Mimi - of all his friends- weighs about the same as him and just as he worked out they jump on the see saw and go up and down, up and down and have a fantastic time! Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep34
programme.desc: What Can I Do With My Nature Collection? - Jess shows Mimi his lovely Nature Collection. She really likes it and wonders what he's going to do with it. Now that's a good question! Jess thinks he'll display it but with the pups racing around it'd soon get damaged. He asks Horace if he could use it to make musical instruments, some things make a great sound but others aren't so good. It's time to go on a picnic with Mimi and his friends. Jess brings his Nature Collection along and when all his friends want to play a game Jess has a great idea. He's found the perfect thing to do with his Nature Collection! They can use them to make a funny obstacle course race. Brilliant!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep206

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep619

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep621

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.desc: Po and the Furious Five meet their greatest challenge yet: a supernatural creature who is invincible to the powers of kung fu.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week, hockrockb (a hot young rock band) and Tokyo Rikisha (a group who also share Japanese culture as rickshaw pullers) are coming to chat and perform.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Hit The Road 5Minutes
programme.desc: Take a drive in Kagoshima! After circling the ever-erupting Sakurajima, we head to the southern tip for a sand bath utilizing geothermal energy, where you'll feel the vitality of the earth!

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers
programme.desc: Nishimonai's Bon Odori dancers hide their faces under hoods and patch together old family kimonos to dance with the spirits of the dead.

programme.title: Framing Everyday Moments
programme.desc: A unique time-lapse photography project. Shot by pros and non-pros from around the world, on the transience of nature, celestial phenomena, cityscapes and each single moment of everyday life.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Ramen Japan 5Min.
programme.desc: A gourmet tour of ramen all around Japan. This time: the birthplace of tonkotsu, Fukuoka. Looking at three different styles, we'll learn this ramen's secrets, and the story of its creation.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Goto Netsuko is an Aufguss master, the person in charge of circulating air and directing heat inside a sauna. She is one of Japan's best, a true ambassador for the natural sauna experience.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Tamir Blum, a young Israeli man in Chiba who develops a robot to help farmers deal with labor shortages, as well as Chris Peters, a UK-born street performer who amuses crowds around Japan.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Reading Japan
programme.desc: Reading Japan shares short stories from Japan. Today's episode is "Tanaka-san Doesn't Want to Go to the Office" by Akeno Kaeruko, about a middle-aged businessman who you might find at any company.

programme.title: Ramen Japan 5Min.
programme.desc: A fantastic tale of love for local flavor, set in Kurume, birthplace of tonkotsu ramen.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: As Russia's invasion of Ukraine shows no end in sight, we revisit Russians in Japan who appeared on NHK WORLD-JAPAN's Russian language radio show to ask about their thoughts and emotional struggles.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: This time we introduce special series of Fukushima prefecture in September. We present the attractiveness by showing "Japan Railway Journal" , "Through the Kitchen Window" and some other shows.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Reading Japan
programme.desc: Reading Japan shares short stories from Japan. We introduce "The Spider's Thread" that has been read over the decades. It was written by Akutagawa Ryunosuke, one of Japan's leading literary authors.

programme.title: Seasoning The Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC282BlachowiczvsAnkalaev
programme.desc: At UFC 282, Former champion Jan Blachowicz fought for the vacant light heavyweight title against surging contender Magomed Ankalaev. Plus, Paddy The Baddy Pimblett took on Jared Gordon. See the entire main card, and more, of UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep903VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC and reigning featherweight champion, Alexander Volkanovski defends his title against Jiu-Jitsu savant, Brian T-City Ortega at UFC 266. See both men train and prepare to fight for the UFCs 145-pound title.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC270NgannouvsGane
programme.desc: UFC 270 featured a heavyweight bout between reigning champion Francis Ngannou and interim champion Cyril Gane. Also, Brandon Moreno and Deivesion Figueiredo threw down for a third time for flyweight gold. See the main card on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep7
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep4
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep11
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Dawson vs. Green
programme.desc: Prelims - Unbeaten for over seven years, Grant Dawsons hot streak has led him a UFC Fight Night main event on October 8 that will shake up the lightweight Top 10 as he faces surging veteran Bobby Green at the APEX in Las Vegas. Showing the best form of his career in his July finish of former champion Tony Ferguson, Green is determined to stop the rapid rise of Dawson and continue his own march to the top at 155 pounds

programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland
programme.desc: Prelims - Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.

programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland
programme.desc: Main Event - Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.
